input.sentences: its nice to have a jam session outdoors at night .
get some people together and listen to some good music .
people enjoy a good drink with great tunes playing in the background .
there is a cello and guitar playing together .

output.sentences: The band got together tonight for an outdoor jam session.
They practiced polishing up some of their own songs
Some of their friends stopped by to listen to them play their songs.
Some of their session included a special guest cellist.
Everybody had a good time chilling out & enjoying the music.
